t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    q=input()
    a=map(int, raw_input().split(' '))
    list=[0]*10001
    for i in range(0,q):
        list[a[i]]+=1
    pos=0
    max=0
    for i in range(0,10001):
        if list[i] > max:
            pos = i
            max=list[i]
    print pos,' ',list[pos]
